column1: statement
Dr. Anthony Fauci said lockdowns are a method for coercing people to comply with COVID-19 vaccinations.

The Australian Technical Advisory Group on Immunisation advised that the COVID-19 vaccine may be given to patients under sedation for unrelated procedures without consent as a way to force compliance.
Suggests ivermectin is an effective treatment for COVID-19
Gilbert Gottfried died from the COVID-19 vaccine.
2004 video shows Anthony Fauci is ignoring science on natural immunity with regard to COVID-19.
Pfizer paid “$2.8 million bribe payment” to the FDA for COVID-19 vaccine approval.
Foo Fighters drummer Taylor Hawkins died from a COVID-19 vaccine.
"Documents were published confirming Moderna created the COVID-19 Virus.”
A man was arrested “for wearing a T-shirt that says ‘We The People’ and has a picture of the ‘Statue of Liberty.’”
Joe Biden’s announcement that the Justice Department will name a chief prosecutor for pandemic fraud means “the government is going to investigate itself.”
The drug labels for the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine “were blank when they should have contained all these diseases and adverse events" listed in a confidential report.
"People who have had cancer in the past, they get the COVID jab and now, they're getting cancer two to three, four months later and it's the same cancer they had except much worse."
Dr. Anthony Fauci has not spoken or appeared publicly for several weeks.
CDC Director Dr. Rochelle Walensky said she gets COVID-19 reports from CNN.
Wearing masks is “COVID theater” and “not doing anything.”
“Over-vaccination causes faster mutation of the (COVID-19) virus, which causes a super virus we may not have the ability to fight off.”
“News report accidentally reveals doctors giving ‘banned’ COVID treatment to the Queen.”
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has amassed the “largest collection of human data in history” through COVID-19 PCR tests.
Video shows that Sûreté du Québec officers “removed their identifying names and badge numbers from their uniforms in Ottawa.”
“Airline CEO gets pied for forcing vaccinations”
List shows “1,000 peer reviewed studies questioning COVID-19 vaccine safety”
“Johns Hopkins University confirms: You can be vaccinated with a PCR test, even without knowing”
"According to Congress, travel nurses need a pay cap.”
"Study proves children’s hearts destroyed by COVID vaccine."
The New York City Police Department arrested a 9-year-old "because she didn’t have a vaccine card in the museum."
The CDC was “normalizing blood clots” by tweeting about the health condition before the Super Bowl.
COVID-19 vaccines caused a 40% increase in deaths identified by a life insurance company.
COVID spelled backward is “divoc” which means "possession of the evil spirit" in Hebrew.
“We all know China created COVID.”
Says a Washington Post headline and graphic about COVID-19 deaths are misleading.
In England, “official data shows children are up to 52 times more likely to die following COVID-19 vaccination than unvaccinated children.”
Says remdesivir is responsible for killing patients hospitalized with COVID-19.
Says C.S. Lewis wrote, “They believed blindly everything they heard or read in the papers. They gave up their freedoms.”
Comedian Heather McDonald collapsed on stage as a result of the COVID-19 vaccine.
“Fifty percent of the Ottawa police force have all turned in their resignation.”
The federal government requires “COVID passports to visit the movies.”
Joe Biden gave his used face mask to Stephen Breyer.

Turkey, Brazil, Britain, Sweden, Spain, Czech Republic, Mexico, El Salvador, Japan and Singapore canceled all COVID-19 quarantine procedures, testing and compulsory vaccination and are considering COVID-19 “just a seasonal flu.”
“Few, If Any, Doses of Spikevax or Comirnaty Available in United States, Despite FDA Approvals”
Says Johns Hopkins virologist "James Kelly" said the COVID-19 vaccine “discriminates, divides, and judges society as it is.”
Research from Japan shows “ivermectin is effective against omicron in Phase III trial.”
‘The Simpsons’ predicted Canada’s trucker convoy protest.
“The convoy in Canada has made the Guinness Book of World Records for the longest convoy.”
Picture shows the “Freedom Convoy” trucks in Canada.
"British data show the COVID shots are an abysmal failure, as COVID infection rates in the U.K. are higher among the ‘fully vaccinated’ in all adult cohorts.”
Says Jen Psaki said in January 2022 that people will start seeing direct deposits in their bank account this weekend and payments to eligible Americans will continue for several weeks.
The CDC staged “the ‘escaping monkeys’ as a cover story for releasing the next bioweapon.”
Military data from 2021 show military members experienced spikes of 300% in miscarriages, almost 300% in cancer diagnoses and 1,000% in neurological issues.
Photo shows Amish who drove 2.5 hours with the “Freedom Convoy” to cook them food at their next stop.
Vaccine makers “are shipping lots of jabs with varying ingredients, potency & EVEN placebo lots.”
"Large, peer-reviewed research study proves ivermectin works” as a COVID-19 preventative.
“All these athletes are dropping dead on the field” after receiving the COVID-19 vaccination.

“There’s 150 I believe now – it’s over 100 professional athletes dead, professional athletes, the prime of their life, dropping dead that are vaccinated, right on the pitch, right on the field, right on the court."
COVID-19-induced pneumonia is "is actually mast cell degranulation of the lungs," a type of allergic reaction.
President Joe Biden gave Congress an exemption from vaccine mandate
Says Louie Anderson was flying to appear on Conan O’Brien’s show when he became ill a few weeks after receiving his third vaccine dose.
A German doctor discovered the COVID-19 vaccines include graphene oxide or graphene hydroxide, and the full list of ingredients is secret because of the emergency use authorization.
The CDC said that 75% of COVID-19 deaths have involved people with at least four comorbidities.
Four players have dropped out of the Australian Open with “chest pains.”
Novak Djokovic is the first professional athlete to be banned from a major sporting event for “not taking drugs.”
“If you stop testing (for COVID-19) it all goes away and people just have colds like before.”
"Even the WHO has conceded that the (SARS- CoV-2) virus … is no more dangerous than the common flu, with an infection fatality rate of 0.14%."
Carlos Gimenez “wants a national database to track you and discriminate against you.”
Video shows Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez pouring shots for a group of people “days before testing positive” for COVID-19.
Video shows Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer laughing at Novak Djokovic after he was stuck in an Australian airport.
“The CDC director just said that 75% of ‘Covid deaths’ occurred in people with at least four comorbidities.”
"Biden's CDC Director ADMITS Her Own Employees Aren't Getting Vaccinated."
Says Bob Saget died from the COVID-19 vaccine.
“We have over 100,000 children, which we’ve never had before, in serious condition, and many on ventilators” due to the coronavirus.
“No one has been hospitalized for” the omicron variant of COVID-19.
“Data from around the world suggests that omicron favors the fully vaccinated.”
If you have “natural immunity,” getting vaccinated against COVID-19 “is more likely to harm you severely.”
"Germany: 96% of Latest Omicron Patients were FULLY Vaccinated – Only 4% Unvaccinated”
"Half a million sharks could be killed to make the COVID-19 vaccine."

When children are given vaccines for COVID-19, “a viral gene will be injected into your children's cells. This gene forces your child’s body to make toxic spike proteins. These proteins often cause permanent damage in children’s critical organs."
Tylenol "ruins your ability to kill” COVID-19.
“Pfizer CEO: New Pill Will Have a Microchip That Transmits Info Once You Swallow It!”
President Joe Biden “never had a” COVID-19 “plan.”
"Yale study: Vaccinated people more likely to be infected than those without the jab.”
The CDC finally admits its COVID-19 test can’t tell the difference between the virus and the flu
Vaccines are why flights have been shut down worldwide.
COVID-19 is a synthetic version of “snake venom” that evil forces are spreading through remdesivir, the COVID-19 vaccines and drinking water to “make you a hybrid of Satan.”
The COVID-19 vaccines contain “HIV lipid wrappers.”
“Worldwide data has confirmed the vaccinated are developing COVID vaccine-induced Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome.”
Luc Montagnier's death is linked to his "exposing" that there's HIV in the COVID-19 vaccine.
Says the FDA said that Pfizer “falsely misled” the agency about the safety of the COVID-19 vaccines and that the shots are killing more people than they save.
Says that President Joe Biden said Americans will start seeing “direct deposits in their bank accounts this weekend,” and that Medicare recipients will get back $2,880.
Pfizer is "literally using the force of government and the culture of fear to jab children under 5 — with zero basis in science — to make billions of dollars."
“The second booster has eight strains of HIV.”
“A grand jury trial begins into crimes against humanity" involving a fabricated coronavirus pandemic.
"In Joe Biden’s America, your children are more likely to have access to a crack pipe than a mask-free education."
“National Guard doctors find hospitals empty of COVID patients.”
“In New York state, if you’re white, you have to go to the back of the line to get medical help.”
Image from news broadcast shows a hospital in France trying to pass off a mannequin as a COVID-19 patient.
"Total deaths from COVID MUCH LOWER than reported.”
Estimated annual COVID-19 deaths in the U.S. totals 27,530, after you subtract those who died “with, not from” COVID-19, not in nursing homes and who didn't have four or more comorbidities.
Walgreens refrigerators are scanning shoppers’ hands and foreheads for “the mark of the beast,” and that “if you don’t have the mark later on, you won’t be able to buy.”
Says Betty White said Dec. 28, days before she died, “Eat healthy and get all your vaccines. I just got boosted today.”
“Six-month Pfizer data show COVID vaccine causes more illness than it prevents.”
